text:
@GaryLineker Aren't you one of the people, along with probably many in Hyde Park, who was asking for #DominicCummngs to be hung, drawn and quartered, for an offence less likely to spread #coronavirus than these pointless protestors? 
I think so. #AllLivesMatter

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
